mapper.select: SELECT menu_id, name, url, icon, color, hm.parent_menu_id, quick_id, quick_menu_order, hpm.parent_name AS parent, frame_on FROM hhs_menu hm JOIN hhs_parent_menu hpm ON hm.parent_menu_id = hpm.parent_menu_id WHERE hm.parent_menu_id = #{parent_menu_id}

SELECT menu_id, name, url, icon, color, hm.parent_menu_id, quick_id, quick_menu_order, hpm.parent_name AS parent, frame_on FROM hhs_menu hm JOIN hhs_parent_menu hpm ON hm.parent_menu_id = hpm.parent_menu_id WHERE quick_id = #{quick_id} ORDER BY quick_menu_order

SELECT icon_id, `row`, col, folder, folder_name, folder_icon_id, i.menu_id, m.name, m.url, m.icon, m.color, pm.parent_name AS parent FROM hhs_icon i LEFT JOIN hhs_menu m ON i.menu_id = m.menu_id LEFT JOIN hhs_parent_menu pm ON m.parent_menu_id = pm.parent_menu_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hhs_icon(`row`, col, folder, folder_name) VALUES (#{row}, #{col}, CASE WHEN #{folder} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, #{folder_name})
mapper.select: SELECT icon_id, `row`, col, folder, folder_name, folder_icon_id, i.menu_id, m.name, m.url, m.icon, m.color, pm.parent_name AS parent FROM hhs_icon i LEFT JOIN hhs_menu m ON i.menu_id = m.menu_id LEFT JOIN hhs_parent_menu pm ON m.parent_menu_id = pm.parent_menu_id ORDER BY icon_id DESC LIMIT 1
